Package domainLayer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Login<T>
    The interface defining all the methods during login and logouts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application  
    Candidate  
    CheckPreconditions
    CheckPreconditions is a class with static methods to be called to ensure inputs are the ones expected.
    Company  
    HR  
    IdGenerator
    This class generates id for HRs, candidates, and admins.
    Interview  
    InterviewPortal
    The interviews are displayed by this class.
    Levenshtein  
    LoginAdmin
    Implements the methods of Login interface.
    LoginCandidate
    Implementation of Login for Candidate's
    LoginHelper
    LoginHelper class is the one responsible for updating the user when the latter logs in or out of the system.
    LoginHR
    Implements Login interface for HR.
    Message
    The Message class is the one used to generate messages for cases when a candidates applies for a company(message to be sent to the HR or the company), or an HR schedules an interview(Message to be sent to the candidate).
    Recommendation  
    RecommendationHelper  
    Resume  
    ToStringHelper  
    User  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CandidateStatus  
    CandidateType
    This class is to enforce the type of Candidate 's.
    InterviewStatus
    This class is to enforce the state of an Interview: either scheduled or attained.

    The possible types of Log state of any user.
